lu.softec.maven.mavenizer.mavenfile
Interface MavenFileFactory

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultMavenFileFactory
public interface MavenFileFactory

Factory for creating unique and consistant MavenFile instances All instances provided by this factory are held in memory until VM termination. A given File could be associated with only a single MavenFile. Further request will returns the same MavenFile, and inconsistant request will cause an IllegalArgumentException.

Convert a FileDependencySet into a MavenFileSet.

Parameters:
fileSet - the FileDependencySet to convert
Returns:
a MavenFileSet representing the provided FileDependencySet
Throws:
java.io.IOException - when an I/O error occurs during access to the related files while analysing them.
InvalidMavenCoordinatesException - when a MavenFile with an invalid set of coordinate would have been created

org.apache.maven.artifact.resolver.ArtifactNotFoundException

Convert a simple File into a MavenFile by analysing the file. Obviously, this could only works using a JAR file as source.

Parameters:
file - the File to be mavenized
Returns:
a MavenFile representing the provided File
Throws:
java.io.IOException - when an I/O error occurs during access to the related files while analysing them.
InvalidMavenCoordinatesException - when a MavenFile with an invalid set of coordinate would have been created

getMavenFile

MavenFile getMavenFile(java.io.File file,
                       java.lang.String groupId,
                       java.lang.String artifactId,
                       java.lang.String version,
                       java.lang.String classifier,
                       MavenFileSet deps,
                       org.apache.maven.artifact.repository.ArtifactRepository repository,
                       java.util.List remoteRepositories)
                       throws InvalidMavenCoordinatesException,
                              org.apache.maven.artifact.resolver.ArtifactResolutionException,
                              org.apache.maven.artifact.resolver.ArtifactNotFoundException
Associate a File with its Maven coordinates and dependencies

Parameters:
file - the File
groupId - the groupId for this file
artifactId - the artifactId for this file
version - the version for this file
classifier - the classifier for this file. May be null.
deps - the dependencies of this file.
repository - local repository to look for missing artifacts
repositories - list of remote repositories to download missing artifacts
Returns:
a MavenFile associating the File with the above coordinates and dependencies.
Throws:
InvalidMavenCoordinatesException - when a MavenFile with an invalid set of coordinate would have been created
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when a previously existing MavenFile exists and is inconsistant with the current request
org.apache.maven.artifact.resolver.ArtifactResolutionException
org.apache.maven.artifact.resolver.ArtifactNotFoundException

Provide hints to the factory for qualifying non-maven files when these are requested.

Parameters:
info - partial coordinates to be associated with either all non-qualified file or a specific file

getMavenInfo

Return available hint for a given name.

Parameters:
name - name of the file without extension or artifactId
Returns:
the hint previously provided or null if none have been found.

getFileMavenInfo

                               java.lang.String artifactId)
Return computed hints for a given File or artifactId in this order, fallbacking to defaults or NOINFO as appropriate.

Parameters:
file - the file that should be hinted
artifactId - the artifactId the could be hinted
Returns:
the hint computed or FileMavenInfo.NOINFO
